ComicInfo.Summary: Lucifer's Arena [Inferno! Part 3]: Lady Death concludes her battle with War. Arriving in Las Vegas, Lady Death discovers that Leviatha is residing there and resolves to track her down. What she finds instead is her old pal, Cremator, working for her enemies. Once Cremator has his memories restored, he touches Lady Death and she transforms into her human form of Hope. Leviatha chooses this moment to attack and easily defeats Hope. She merges Hope and Lady Death back into one being which only succeeds in making Lady Death stronger.
